1. Introduction slide shows "Sixth Edition" while the speaker mentions the APA publication manual version.
2. The speaker points out the Word ribbon and Home tab over a blank document.
3. The user opens File > Page Setup to adjust margins as instructed.
4. A dialog box asks to change Normal.dot defaults while the speaker suggests saving settings as default.
5. The Header & Footer tab appears and the speaker says to insert automatic page numbers and move between header and text.
6. In the first page header, "Running head:” is typed and an ALL CAPS abbreviation is added after the colon.

Therefore, the correct answer is option B: 1 -> 2 -> 3 -> 4 -> 5 -> 6.
